id.$comment: reference to developer in the system, not the same as the mbr_id, level of abstraction

mbr_id.$comment: also partitionId for container; NOTE: sysName should not render down to any boolean version of false

parent_id.description: parent id of developer, most likely organization or human core id
parent_id.$comment: parent id of feedback, chatSnippetId which will be found in the conversation log (or archive? No, exchanges with unaddressed feedback might not be archived) for this mbr_id
